mapper.select: SELECT cr.chat_room_id as roomId , cr.title as title , c.speaker_id as speakerId , c.content as latestChat , latest_at.max_at as latestChatLDT , crc_cnt.cnt as unreadChat , u.profile_pic as pic FROM chat_join cj1 JOIN chat_room cr ON cr.chat_room_id = cj1.chat_room_id JOIN chat c ON c.speaker_id = cj1.cj_id JOIN ( SELECT cj3.chat_room_id, max(c1.created_at) AS max_at FROM chat c1 JOIN chat_join cj3 ON cj3.cj_id = c1.speaker_id GROUP BY cj3.chat_room_id ) latest_at ON cj1.chat_room_id = latest_at.chat_room_id AND c.created_at = latest_at.max_at LEFT JOIN( SELECT cj.chat_room_id , count(crc.listener_id) AS cnt FROM chat_join cj JOIN `user` u ON u.user_id = cj.user_id AND u.user_id = #{signedUserId} JOIN chat_receive crc ON crc.listener_id = cj.cj_id GROUP BY cj.chat_room_id ) crc_cnt ON crc_cnt.chat_room_id = cj1.chat_room_id JOIN `user` u ON u.user_id = cj1.user_id WHERE cj1.chat_room_id IN ( SELECT cr.chat_room_id FROM chat_room cr JOIN chat_join cj2 ON cj2.chat_room_id = cr.chat_room_id AND cj2.user_id = #{signedUserId} ) ORDER BY latest_at.max_at DESC limit #{page}, 30
SELECT cr.chat_room_id as roomId , cr.title as title FROM chat_room cr WHERE cr.chat_room_id IN ( SELECT chat_room_id FROM chat_join cj WHERE user_id = #{signedUserId} )
